variant.question:
Refer to figure.

options.text: When the C1 and C2 sensors detect smoke.
When only the C1 and C3 sensors detect smoke.
When only one sensor detects smoke.
Only when all sensors detect smoke.

variant.question: The starter/generator consists of...

options.text: A series wound DC motor and a shunt wound DC generator
An AC motor and a DC alternator
An AC starter motor and an AC generator
A DC starter motor and an AC generator

variant.question: To reverse the direction of rotation of a shunt-type (parallel field) DC electric motor, it is necessary to

options.text: reverse the polarity of either the stator or the rotor.
reverse the polarity of the motor connections.
change the connections from shunt to series.
connect a phase-shift capacitor to the field circuit.

variant.question: A combination of an AC electric motor and a generator is called...
The type of windings commonly used in DC starter motors are
Generators are usually connected to the same bus-bar..

options.text: depending on the type of generator.
depending on the type of engine.
